values: 跑；奔跑；跑步；开始（比赛）；流动；使流动；流淌；熔化；（对…）进行（测试或检验）；运转；使运转；操作；管理；经营；负责；使用（车辆或机器等）；开展；提供；开设；驾驶；（按某路线）行驶；移动（某物）；开车送；穿过；通过；迅速赶往；延伸；持续；继续；达到；接近（某程度）；（使）导向；（尤指在美国）参加竞选；参加选举；出版；发表；刊登；传递；传播；传送；泄露；漏出；输出；放出（液体）；具有（法律）效力；生效；起作用；花费；耗费；走私；偷运；包含；变成；成为；变得；掉色；脱针

跑；奔跑；跑步；（尤指短程或定期，乘交通工具的）一段旅程；路程；连续的时间段；连续发生的事件；一系列（成功或失败）；大量需求；抢购；挤兑；自由出入；自由使用；连续演出；连续上映；（液体的）流动；小溪；溪流；（袜子等的）抽丝；腹泻；（船的）尾部；（滑雪）滑道；（板球）跑动得分；（机器等的）运转；运行；（剧场、电影的）上映期；展出期；生产批次；（疾病的）流行期；（鱼的）洄游；（动物的）迁徙；竞选；（顺着音阶的）急奏；急唱；顺子

synonym.mean: 奔跑；赛跑；趋向；奔跑的路程

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 连续的；流动的；跑着的；运转着的
跑步者；走私者；推销员；送信人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 强调小跑时上下弹跳的动作，是介于跑与走之间轻快的快速运动。
最普通用词，指由于各种原因而急速奔跑。
多用于赛跑，指以最快速度奔跑。
指水或其它液体从源头流出，不断地朝某一方向流动，可用作引申。
通常指从高向低或从上向下的急剧流动。也可作引申用。
侧重水继续不断地往前流，不关心其流量的大小和速度的快慢。
指液体向任何方向流动，暗示比flow快而有力。

word_group.brief_definition: 被用完, 被耗尽, 用完, 花光；到期, 期满
偶然碰见, 偶然发现
突然离开, 逃离, 逃避, 避免正视
最终；长期地, 从长远来看
带着…逃离；把…用掉；轻易接受（他人的想法）；战胜；制伏；不受…的约束
寻求, 追求, 孜孜以求
下乡；赶上；减少, 降低, 缩减；耗尽；停止运转；衰退, 衰弱；下降；破败
达到；足够供…之用；有钱用于
经营业务；经营生意；做生意

list.abstract: run是一个英文单词，音标为[rʌn]。 其用作动词时，基本意思是“跑”、“移动”，引申可表示“（使）流动”，在日常非正式场合时，还可表示“操纵”“管理”，引申可表示“延伸”“延续”等。 其用作名词时，意思是“跑，奔跑”，也可指“旅行，运行期间”，还可指“持续的演出”“时期，一段时间”。引申可指“趋向，趋势”“兜风”“购物潮”“得分”等。
宋元根（1982年12月17日-），出生于韩国首尔，韩国男演员、导演。 2009年，发表专辑《强力的女人》，深受歌迷喜爱。2013年5月，出演的电视剧《欧若拉公主》在韩国开播。2015年11月，主演的电视剧《明天也胜利》在韩国开播。2021年9月，执导的纪录片《PAN MUN JOM, You have never seen》在DMZ国际纪录片节上映。

yingyinNormal.en: Run away, Simba. Run. Run away and never return.
yingyinNormal.zh: 跑的远远的，辛巴快跑，跑的远远的，再也不要回来了。

yingyinNormal.en: I was wrong. I'm sorry. Run. Run!
yingyinNormal.zh: 看来我错了，真抱歉，快跑，跑啊！

yingyinNormal.en: Stay back! I've got kiwi. Run, Joey, run!
yingyinNormal.zh: 别过来，我有奇异果，跑呀，乔伊。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. Run ten blocks, that'll help the smell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 跑十条街会更臭。

yingyinNormal.en: They're right outside. And if I run?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们就在外面。如果我跑呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Wait. Honey, have you ever run before?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，亲爱的，你以前跑过步吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You're right. Penny jogs. Maybe you guys can run together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说得对，佩妮经常跑步，你们可以一起跑的。

yingyinNormal.en: Truck, wiggle out, jump, run.
yingyinNormal.zh: 上卡车，扭出来，跳下去，快跑。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe you should run away more.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你应该试着多逃跑。

yingyinNormal.en: You're going to run like a coward?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你只是想像懦夫一样逃跑？

yingyinNormal.en: What's alopecia? That is why I run.
yingyinNormal.zh: 秃头症是什么？这就是我去跑步的原因。

yingyinNormal.en: Going to the gym. Run off some of this stress.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要去健身房。跑步消解压力。

yingyinNormal.en: Good idea, Daddy Pig. How far can you run? What? Well, I can run as far as you like.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是个好主意，猪爸爸！那么你能跑多远呢？什么？呃，你想让我跑多远我就能跑多远。

yingyinNormal.en: I can run at a hundred miles an hour. I can run at a million miles an hour.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一小时能跑一百公里。我一小时能跑一百万公里。

yingyinNormal.en: You two must have been so cute running around on a barge. You never run on a barge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们两个在游艇上跑来跑去一定很可爱。游艇上不能跑来跑去。

yingyinNormal.en: It's great to be outdoors. We should run around a bit and get some exercise. I want to eat, then have a nap. I certainly don't want to run around.
yingyinNormal.zh: 出来玩真开心呐，我们应该稍微跑一下，做些锻炼。我想吃点东西，再睡一会。我可不想再跑来跑去了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's great to be outdoors. We should run around a bit and get some exercise. I want to eat, then have a nap. I certainly don't want to run around.
yingyinNormal.zh: 出来玩真开心呐，我们应该稍微跑一下，做些锻炼。我想吃点东西，再睡一会。我可不想再跑来跑去了。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you run on it? Watch this. Pedro likes running around having fun. Everybody likes running around having fun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那跑步没问题吗？你们看好了！佩德罗喜欢快乐的跑来跑去。大家都喜欢快乐的跑来跑去。

yingyinNormal.en: You see? My shadow is still underneath me. Run faster. Even if I run faster, my shadow keeps up with me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们看？我的影子一直都在我脚下。再跑快一点！就算是我再跑得快一点，我的影子也还是跟着我。

yingyinNormal.en: Justin Bieber got a hit and run, Chris Brown got a hit and run, Rihanna got hit and still didn't run.
yingyinNormal.zh: 贾斯汀·比伯和克里斯·布朗肇事逃逸了，但蕾哈娜被打了却没有跑。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 旅程; 行程; 路线

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 跑；奔；管理；照管；运行；运转；赛跑
n. 逃跑者；出逃者；离家出走者
n. 跑动者；走私者；滑行装置；滑道；滑槽；冰刀；蔓；长匐茎；纤匐枝；长条地毯；回转磨石；上磨盘；警官；青鲹

word_family.mean: v. 跑；奔；奔忙；通过；传递；迅速传播；传开；流动；行驶；管理；经营；负责；开动；操作；运转；继续；持续；具有法律效力；起作用；竞选；当候选人；出版；刊登；被出版；被刊登；偷运；走私；花费

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 被用完；被耗尽；用完；花光；到期；期满

sense_info_list.en: be in charge of

examination_example.sentence: It has become normal that well-paid executives should not be accountable for what happens in the organisations that they <highlight>run</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 高薪资的管理者不为发生在其组织内的事情担责，这已属正常现象。

examination_example.sentence: Entergy <highlight>runs</highlight> 11 other reactors in the United States, including Pilgrim Nuclear station in Plymouth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Entergy在美国运营着另外11座反应堆，包括普利茅斯的皮尔格林核电站。

examination_example.sentence: Pledging to <highlight>run</highlight> Pilgrim safely, the company has applied for federal permission to keep it open for another 20 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司承诺安全运营Pilgrim，并已申请联邦许可，将其再开放20年。

sense_info_list.en: be in or cause to be in operation; function or cause to function

examination_example.sentence: Carbon is burned as biofuel in vehicles that would otherwise <highlight>run</highlight> on fossil fuels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 碳作为使用化石燃料的生物燃料的车辆中燃烧。

examination_example.sentence: But phones <highlight>run</highlight> on batteries, and batteries can die faster than we realize.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是手机靠电池运行，电池寿命会比我们意识到的减得更快。

examination_example.sentence: Permission to <highlight>run</highlight> a nuclear plant is a public trust.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 允许使用核能源是公众的信任。

examination_example.sentence: Arizona had attempted to fashion state policies that <highlight>ran</highlight> parallel to the existing federal ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚利桑那州曾试图制定与现有联邦政策平行的州政策。

examination_example.sentence: Often <highlight>run</highlight> against the current political system.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经常与现行政治制度背道而驰。

sense_info_list.en: go rapidly or hurriedly

examination_example.sentence: Plants can't <highlight>run</highlight> away from danger, so investing energy in a body system would be a very poor evolutionary strategy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 植物无法逃离危险，将能量投入到身体系统中，是一个非常糟糕的进化策略。

examination_example.sentence: People who <highlight>run</highlight> for the bus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 跑向公共汽车的人们。

examination_example.sentence: Every Saturday morning, at 9 am, more than 50, 000 runners set off to <highlight>run</highlight> 5km around their local park.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每周六上午9点，超过50000名跑步者出发绕着他们当地的公园跑5公里。

sense_info_list.en: publish or be published in a newspaper or magazine

examination_example.sentence: "Nature gave us lips to conceal our teeth," <highlight>ran</highlight> one popular Victorian maxim.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一则维多利亚时代发表的箴言称“自然予我们嘴唇以掩藏牙齿”。

sense_info_list.en: a particular period of time

examination_example.sentence: The author examines the practice of grade forgiveness by listing its long-<highlight>run</highlight> effects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者通过列举等级宽恕的长期影响来检验等级宽恕的实践。

examination_example.sentence: I don't like quotas either; they <highlight>run</highlight> counter to my belief in meritocracy, governance by the capable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我也不喜欢配额；它们与我对精英管理、由有能力的人治理的信念背道而驰。

examination_example.sentence: The number of adults doing weekly sport did rise, by nearly 2 million in the <highlight>run</highlight>-up to 2012.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2012年之前，每周做运动的成年人数量确实增加了近200万。

sense_info_list.en: (with reference to a liquid) flow or cause to flow
(cause to) extend in a particular direction
an enclosure for animals where they may feed and exercise
(of a play or exhibition) be staged or presented
a condition of the bowels in which the contents are passed out of the body too often and in a form that is too liquid
a long, vertical hole in tights and stockings
the average or usual type of person or thing
a quantity or amount of something produced at one time
a journey accomplished or route taken by a vehicle, aircraft, or boat, especially on a regular basis
sense_info_list.zh: 旅程; 行程; 路线

sense_info_list.en: take guns or drugs illegally from one place to another
a situation in which many people suddenly sell a particular product
a situation in which many people suddenly buy a particular product
organize the way you live or work
a small stream or brook
be a candidate in a political election
a sudden demand for repayment from a bank made by a large number of lenders
an annual mass migration of fish up a river to spawn, or their return migration afterward
(of a bus, train, ferry, or other form of transportation) make a regular journey on a particular route

使处于某种状态; 趋势

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 被用完；被耗尽；用完；花光；到期；期满
突然离开；逃离；逃避；避免正视

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 覆盖；蔓延于；大批出没于；超过；超越；越过；占领；武力侵占；延伸到…之外；跑过
n. 逃跑者；出逃者；离家出走者
n. 跑动者；走私者；滑行装置；滑道；滑槽；冰刀；蔓；长匐茎；纤匐枝；长条地毯；回转磨石；上磨盘；警官；青鲹

word_family.mean: v. 跑；奔；奔忙；通过；传递；迅速传播；传开；流动；行驶；管理；经营；负责；开动；操作；运转；继续；持续；具有法律效力；起作用；竞选；当候选人；出版；刊登；被出版；被刊登；偷运；走私；花费

sense_info_list.en: be in or cause to be in operation; function or cause to function

examination_example.sentence: The level of emissions they cause will depend on how the electricity to <highlight>run</highlight> them is generated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们造成的排放水平将取决于运行电力产生的方式。

examination_example.sentence: In Brazil, the multinational corporation Adidas has been <highlight>running</highlight> a shoe-recycling program called "Sustainable Footprint" since 2012.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在巴西，跨国公司阿迪达斯(Adidas)自2012年以来一直在实施一项名为“可持续足迹”的鞋子回收计划。

sense_info_list.en: be in charge of
go rapidly or hurriedly
sense_info_list.zh: 奔跑; 跑步; 匆忙前往; 逃跑
使处于某种状态; 趋势

examination_example.sentence: If they abandon their beliefs, they <highlight>run</highlight> the risk of losing social ties.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果他们放弃信仰，他们就有失去社会联系的风险。

examination_example.sentence: By injecting fear into the discourse about food, we <highlight>run</highlight> the risk of eroding consumer trust in single products and the food business.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过在有关食品的讨论中注入恐惧，我们有可能削弱消费者对单一产品和食品行业的信任。

examination_example.sentence: Jancke researched the effects of music lessons, and he believes that the only way to understand their effects is to <highlight>run</highlight> longitudinal studies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Jancke研究了音乐课的效果，他认为了解其效果的唯一方法是进行纵向研究。

sense_info_list.en: to lead or stretch

examination_example.sentence: They are a technological leap, transporting iron ore along routes which <highlight>run</highlight> for hundreds of kilometers from mines to their destinations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们是一项技术飞跃，将铁矿石从矿山运输到目的地，运输路线长达数百公里。

examination_example.sentence: These beams formed the cross-shaped roof that <highlight>ran</highlight> the length of the central part of the cathedral.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些横梁构成了横跨大教堂中心部分的十字形屋顶。

sense_info_list.en: a situation when many people want to buy something

examination_example.sentence: If Marconi said he thought it might rain, there was likely to be a <highlight>run</highlight> on umbrellas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果Marconi说他认为可能会下雨，那大家就很可能都跑去买雨伞。

examination_example.sentence: But that creative thinking ought to <highlight>run</highlight> through all of school life, infusing the way humanities and natural sciences are learned.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这种创造性思维应该贯穿学校生活的方方面面，融入人文和自然科学的学习方式。

sense_info_list.en: (of a play or exhibition) be staged or presented
continue or be valid or operative for a particular period of time
organize the way you live or work
(of a bus, train, ferry, or other form of transportation) make a regular journey on a particular route
be a candidate in a political election

word_usage.usage: run作动词表“变得”时，为系动词，常接形容词作表语。如：河水开始干涸。The river was beginning to run dry.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 奔跑; 跑步; 匆忙前往; 逃跑
使处于某种状态; 趋势

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 跑；奔；管理；照管；运行；运转；赛跑
n. 逃跑者；出逃者；离家出走者
n. 跑动者；走私者；滑行装置；滑道；滑槽；冰刀；蔓；长匐茎；纤匐枝；长条地毯；回转磨石；上磨盘；警官；青鲹

word_family.mean: v. 跑；奔；奔忙；通过；传递；迅速传播；传开；流动；行驶；管理；经营；负责；开动；操作；运转；继续；持续；具有法律效力；起作用；竞选；当候选人；出版；刊登；被出版；被刊登；偷运；走私；花费

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 突然离开；逃离；逃避；避免正视
奔跑追赶；赶抢；快跑躲避

sense_info_list.en: go rapidly or hurriedly
sense_info_list.zh: 奔跑; 跑步; 匆忙前往; 逃跑

examination_example.sentence: Several of the mice are observed <highlight>running</highlight> around the cage walls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 观察到几只老鼠在笼子的四周奔跑。

examination_example.sentence: It seems as if kids are just exercising their bodies when they're <highlight>running</highlight> around, they may actually be exercising their brains as well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然当孩子们在四处奔跑时只是在锻炼他们的身体，但实际上他们可能也在锻炼他们的大脑。

examination_example.sentence: There is no point saying you <highlight>run</highlight> marathons if you are out of breath arriving at the interview on the second floor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你到二楼面试地点时都要上气不接下气，那就别提跑马拉松了。

sense_info_list.en: be in or cause to be in operation; function or cause to function

examination_example.sentence: She thinks it's important to establish that chores are done because they keep the household <highlight>running</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她认为重要的是要确定家务已经完成，因为它们可以维持家庭运转。

examination_example.sentence: Each ship was coal-powered by several boilers constantly kept <highlight>running</highlight> by exhausted crews below deck.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每艘船都由几个锅炉提供煤动力，这些锅炉由甲板下疲惫的船员持续运行。

sense_info_list.en: be in charge of

examination_example.sentence: "It's a different paradigm (范式) of how to treat disease," says Dr. Brenda Rae, who helps <highlight>run</highlight> the family and preventive medicine residency program at Lima Linda University School of Medicine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在利马琳达大学医学院帮助管理家庭和预防医学住院项目的布伦达-雷亚博士(Brenda Rae)说：“这是治疗疾病的不同范式。”

examination_example.sentence: She has once <highlight>run</highlight> a pre-K program.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她曾经管理过一个学前班课程。

examination_example.sentence: That depends on many things, but for purposes of illustration, I have <highlight>run</highlight> some estimates for Montreal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这取决于很多因素，但为了说明问题，我对蒙特利尔进行了一些估算。

examination_example.sentence: Why did the author <highlight>run</highlight> the estimates for Montreal?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者为什么对蒙特利尔进行估算？

examination_example.sentence: Ariely <highlight>ran</highlight> an experiment and found that when only the two "real" were offered, more people chose the less-expensive digital subscription.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Ariely进行了一项实验，发现当只提供两个“真实”时，更多的人选择了更便宜的数字订阅。

sense_info_list.en: pass over; across; or through

examination_example.sentence: Should the cars be programmed to avoid hitting a child <highlight>running</highlight> across the road, even if that will put their passengers at risk?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是否应该对汽车进行编程，以避免撞到横穿马路的儿童，即使那样做会使乘客处于危险之中？

examination_example.sentence: The first rule-examine your life-is the common thread that <highlight>runs</highlight> through the entire book.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一条规则——审视你的生活——是贯穿整本书的共同主线。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>runs</highlight> counter to the public interest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这与公众利益背道而驰。

examination_example.sentence: Such findings, which <highlight>run</highlight> counter to common sense, have surfaced before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些与常识相悖的发现以前也曾出现过。

sense_info_list.en: be a candidate in a political election

sense_info_list.zh: 使处于某种状态; 趋势

sense_info_list.en: (of an athlete or a racehorse) compete in a race
continue or be valid or operative for a particular period of time

examination_example.sentence: If even a small part of such valueless work could be removed, the savings would <highlight>run</highlight> into millions of dollars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果这些无价值工作的一小部分可以被移除，那么节省的资金将达到数百万美元。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>ran</highlight> out of food completely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们完全没有食物了。

sense_info_list.en: (with reference to a liquid) flow or cause to flow

word_usage.usage: run作动词表“变得”时，为系动词，常接形容词作表语。如：河水开始干涸。The river was beginning to run dry.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 最终；长期地；从长远来看

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 跑；奔；管理；照管；运行；运转；赛跑
n. 跑动者；走私者；滑行装置；滑道；滑槽；冰刀；蔓；长匐茎；纤匐枝；长条地毯；回转磨石；上磨盘；警官；青鲹

word_family.mean: v. 跑；奔；奔忙；通过；传递；迅速传播；传开；流动；行驶；管理；经营；负责；开动；操作；运转；继续；持续；具有法律效力；起作用；竞选；当候选人；出版；刊登；被出版；被刊登；偷运；走私；花费

examination_example.sentence: I had to jump out of bed and <highlight>run</highlight> to silence it before my family was awoken.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不得不从床上跳起来，在我的家人被吵醒之前跑去把它关掉。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>ran</highlight> desperately but failed to catch up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我拼命跑，但没能追上。

examination_example.sentence: After a long <highlight>run</highlight>, you may feel like you're in pain, you may feel tired.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 长跑后，你可能会感到疼痛，感到疲倦。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Running</highlight> the website has almost turned into a full-time job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 运营网站几乎变成了一份全职工作。

examination_example.sentence: And "<highlight>running</highlight> a family household requires high-level planning and coordinating (协调)," she says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “经营家庭需要高水平的计划和协调，”她说。

examination_example.sentence: She <highlight>ran</highlight> the family farm on her own.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她独自经营家庭农场。

examination_example.sentence: The police arrived and the motorway <highlight>ran</highlight> normally again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 警察来了，高速公路又恢复了正常运行。

examination_example.sentence: Now he hopes that other cities will consider making their streets <highlight>run</highlight> smarter instead of just making them bigger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，他希望其他城市会考虑让他们的街道运行得更智能，而不仅仅是让它们变得更大。

examination_example.sentence: If the rivers <highlight>run</highlight> faster in the future on average, the clock will get ahead of standard time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果河流在未来的平均速度加快，时钟将会走在标准时间之前。

examination_example.sentence: Atomic time will get ahead of river time if the rivers <highlight>run</highlight> slower.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果河流运行得更慢，原子时就会比河流时间快。

examination_example.sentence: There exists now a park that has a small river <highlight>running</highlight> through.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在有一个公园，有一条小河穿流而过。

examination_example.sentence: Regular season <highlight>runs</highlight> September through May at Music Hall in summer at Riverbend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 常规赛季从九月持续到五月，夏季在河湾音乐厅举行。

examination_example.sentence: The season <highlight>runs</highlight> June through August, with additional performances in March and September.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个演出季从六月持续到八月，在三月和九月还有额外的演出。

examination_example.sentence: Through the years, I'd <highlight>run</highlight> into former students who would provide updates on old classmates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些年来，我会遇到以前的学生，他们会提供老同学的最新消息。

examination_example.sentence: He is building a four-wheeled robot that will <highlight>run</highlight> on solar and electric power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他正在制造一个使用太阳能和电力驱动的四轮机器人。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>ran</highlight> the risk of losing those students who had a different style of thinking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我冒着失去那些有着不同思维方式的学生的风险。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 奔跑; 跑步; 匆忙前往; 逃跑
(液体)流动; 流淌; 放水
变得; 成为; 趋势

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 跑；奔；管理；照管；运行；运转；赛跑
n. 逃跑者；出逃者；离家出走者
n. 跑动者；走私者；滑行装置；滑道；滑槽；冰刀；蔓；长匐茎；纤匐枝；长条地毯；回转磨石；上磨盘；警官；青鲹

word_family.mean: v. 跑；奔；奔忙；通过；传递；迅速传播；传开；流动；行驶；管理；经营；负责；开动；操作；运转；继续；持续；具有法律效力；起作用；竞选；当候选人；出版；刊登；被出版；被刊登；偷运；走私；花费

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 被用完；被耗尽；用完；花光；到期；期满
偶遇；碰到；陷入；与…相撞；偶然碰见；遇到
突然离开；逃离；逃避；避免正视
带着…逃离；把…用掉；轻易接受（他人的想法）；战胜；制伏；不受…的约束
经营业务；经营生意；做生意
下乡；赶上；减少；降低；缩减；耗尽；停止运转；衰退；衰弱；下降；破败
达到；足够供…之用；有钱用于

sense_info_list.en: go rapidly or hurriedly
sense_info_list.zh: 奔跑; 跑步; 匆忙前往; 逃跑

examination_example.sentence: I tried to hold my cat in my arms, but it <highlight>ran</highlight> away from me in fear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我试图把我的猫抱在怀里，但它吓得从我身边跑开了。

examination_example.sentence: John will have to <highlight>run</highlight> very fast to break the school 100-metre race record in the sports meeting．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 约翰必须要跑得非常快，才能在运动会上打破学校100米赛跑的记录。

examination_example.sentence: He enjoyed <highlight>running</highlight> for exercise around the park when he was free.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他有空时喜欢在公园里跑步锻炼身体。

sense_info_list.en: (with reference to a liquid) flow or cause to flow
sense_info_list.zh: (液体)流动; 流淌; 放水

examination_example.sentence: Some factories stop waste water from <highlight>running</highlight> into rivers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些工厂阻止废水流入河流。

examination_example.sentence: 80% of wastewater around the world is not treated at all, and it is <highlight>running</highlight> into oceans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界上80%的废水完全没有得到处理，而它们正在流入海洋。

examination_example.sentence: Tears <highlight>run</highlight> slowly into this tube drip by drip.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 眼泪一滴一滴地慢慢流进这根管子。

sense_info_list.en: be in charge of

examination_example.sentence: We asked three families who <highlight>run</highlight> homestays to tell us about where they live.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们询问了三个经营寄宿家庭的家庭，请他们告诉我们他们住在哪里。

examination_example.sentence: Now, I feel very confident (信心) in <highlight>running</highlight> a home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，我对经营一个家很有信心。

examination_example.sentence: After that, you can start and <highlight>run</highlight> your own summer business, and you have a chance of winning awards of up to $1000.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 之后，你可以创办和经营自己的暑期公司，并且你有机会赢得高达1000美元的奖励。

sense_info_list.en: be in or cause to be in operation; function or cause to function

examination_example.sentence: Cars will <highlight>run</highlight> on solar power or electricity and will be much cleaner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 汽车将依靠太阳能或电力行驶，而且会更加清洁。

examination_example.sentence: One method of solving the problem was a "hybrid" car, one that <highlight>ran</highlight> partly on petrol and partly on electricity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 解决这个问题的一种方法是“混合动力”汽车，一种部分依靠汽油，部分依靠电力运行的汽车。

examination_example.sentence: Workers Keep Community <highlight>Running</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工作人员维持着社区的运转

sense_info_list.en: (of an athlete or a racehorse) compete in a race

examination_example.sentence: It's a good idea to <highlight>run</highlight> in the marathon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参加马拉松赛跑是个好主意。

examination_example.sentence: Fresh off his MasterChef Junior <highlight>run</highlight>, Evan Robinson, who is only 12 years old, is using his kitchen skills to raise money for Puerto Rico.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年仅12岁的埃文·罗宾逊，刚刚结束他的小小厨神比赛，他正在用自己的厨艺为波多黎各筹款。

examination_example.sentence: He donated his big winning prize in his MasterChef Junior <highlight>run</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他捐出了他在小小厨神比赛中赢得的大奖。

sense_info_list.en: continue or be valid or operative for a particular period of time

examination_example.sentence: The planting usually <highlight>runs</highlight> from 9 a.m. to 1 p.m.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 种植时间通常从上午9点到下午1点。

examination_example.sentence: How long does Liverpool Museum <highlight>run</highlight> daily?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 利物浦博物馆每天开放多长时间？

examination_example.sentence: The after-school exercise classes will <highlight>run</highlight> from 18 December to 14 January.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 课后锻炼班将从12月18日开到1月14日。

sense_info_list.en: be a candidate in a political election

examination_example.sentence: A few months ago I was nominated for Governor of the great state of New York, to <highlight>run</highlight> against Stewart and John.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几个月前，我被提名为纽约州州长，与斯图尔特和约翰竞选。

examination_example.sentence: He felt surprised, angry, dirty and disappointed, and finally decided to give up <highlight>running</highlight> for Governor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他感到惊讶、愤怒、肮和失望，并最终决定放弃竞选州长。

examination_example.sentence: In the story, three people were <highlight>running</highlight> for Governor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 故事中，有三个人在竞选州长。

examination_example.sentence: A theme is a central idea <highlight>running</highlight> throughout the text, connecting the characters and events.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 主题是贯穿全文的中心思想，连接人物和事件。

examination_example.sentence: But there are nerves <highlight>running</highlight> through the middle ear that connect the tongue to the brain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是有神经通过中耳将舌头和大脑连接起来。

examination_example.sentence: Each hole leads to a small tube that <highlight>runs</highlight> to your nose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个洞都通向一根小管子，这条管子通向你的鼻子。

examination_example.sentence: Instead, everything was <highlight>run</highlight> through virtual reality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，一切都是通过虚拟现实运行的。

examination_example.sentence: Another time, she nearly <highlight>ran</highlight> into a ship.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 还有一次，她差点撞上一艘船。

examination_example.sentence: One day I <highlight>ran</highlight> into a stranger as he passed by me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一天，当一个陌生人从我身边经过时，我意外撞到了他。

examination_example.sentence: Animals' food is <highlight>running</highlight> out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动物的食物快耗尽了。

examination_example.sentence: If you eat, you will get thirsty and your water will <highlight>run</highlight> out soon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你吃东西，你就会口渴，而你的水就会很快用完。

sense_info_list.zh: 变得; 成为; 趋势

examination_example.sentence: My blood <highlight>runs</highlight> cold.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我心惊胆战。

word_usage.usage: run作动词表“变得”时，为系动词，常接形容词作表语。如：河水开始干涸。The river was beginning to run dry.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最普通用词，指由于各种原因而急速奔跑。
多用于赛跑，指以最快速度奔跑。
